title: Man charged with kidnapping after allegedly holding woman hostage for nearly a year
description: A man accused of holding a woman hostage for nearly a year was charged with kidnapping after the alleged victim managed to escape to a gas station, authorities said.

title: Transgender care targeted into adulthood in these states
description: Bills across the country are targeting transgender adults and their access to gender affirming care.

title: Political fallout over federal response to Ohio train derailment
description: East Palestine residents are angry and the Biden administration is taking political heat over what's being called a delayed over response to the Ohio train derailment.

title: EPA administrator maintains East Palestine air, water is safe
description: EPA administrator Michael Regan spoke with GMA3 with the latest updates following the train derailment in Ohio.

title: Suspect in series of shootings in Mississippi in custody
description: The suspect in a "series of shootings" in Tate County, Mississippi, has been taken into custody, according to the governor.

title: 13-year-old shot, killed after online dispute, mother says
description: Orie Dodson, 13, was shot dead in front of a church in Indiana. Police found him face down and he was declared dead at the scene. It was ruled a homicide.

title: 4 US service members wounded in helicopter raid that killed ISIS leader in Syria
description: Four U.S. service members were wounded by an explosion during a helicopter raid in northeast Syria Thursday night.

title: Judge rules PGA Tour can depose Saudi backers of LIV Golf
description: A federal judge has ruled the PGA Tour can require documents and depositions from the Saudi Arabia wealth fund and its leader

title: Navy ends Chinese spy balloon recovery operation
description: The U.S. Navy has ended the Chinese spy balloon recovery operation in the ocean off the South Carolina coast begun after was shot down Feb. 4.

title: Floodwaters force WVa students to spend night at high school
description: The flooding forced some high school students to hold an impromptu sleepover.

title: WATCH:  Tourists flock to Yosemite for captivating ‘firefall’
description: Attendance at the popular natural event is limited this year with a new reservation system put in place by the park.

title: Indian authorities accuse BBC of tax evasion after searches
description: India’s Finance Ministry has accused the BBC of tax evasion, saying that it had not fully declared its income and profits from its operations in the country

title: Starbucks bottles recalled due to some drinks possibly containing glass
description: Glass bottles of Starbucks Vanilla Frappuccino have been voluntarily recalled by PepsiCo.

title: Russia, Belarus discuss closer military, economic ties
description: Russian President Vladimir Putin is hosting neighboring ally Belarus’ leader for talks on expanding military and economic cooperation amid the fighting in Ukraine

title: Ohio train derailment: NTSB chair issues 'plea to those spreading misinformation'
description: In a rare series of posts on Twitter on Thursday evening, NTSB Chair Jennifer Homendy issued "a message to the community" and "a plea to those spreading misinformation."

title: Passengers in air for 16 hours return to where they began after JFK electrical fire
description: A flight did a U-turn over the Pacific Ocean to return to its departure airport over 16 hours later because of a closure of New York's JFK Terminal One.

title: Sticky inflation pushes Wall Street toward weekly losses
description: Wall Street is poised to extend its slide a day after U.S. markets suffered their biggest drop in a month on disappointment over an inflation reading that came in hotter than expected

title: UK embassy guard in Berlin gets prison for spying for Russia
description: A former security guard at the British Embassy in Berlin has been sentenced to more than 13 years in prison for putting U.K. diplomats at “maximum risk” by selling secret information to Russia

title: 2 men rescued from rubble 261 hours after devastating earthquake in Turkey
description: Nearly 11 days after a massive earthquake and powerful aftershocks rocked southeastern Turkey, two men trapped beneath the rubble have been rescued.

title: MSU shooting has 'shattered' the community, top prosecutor says
description: Mark Totten, a U.S. attorney with longstanding ties to Michigan State University, talks about the aftermath of the MSU mass shooting

title: US prosecutors ask for 25 more years in prison for R. Kelly
description: Federal prosecutors have asked a judge to give singer R. Kelly 25 more years in prison for his child pornography and enticement convictions last year in Chicago

title: WATCH:  Park visitors capture spectacular images of 'firefall' at Yosemite
description: Yosemite National Park's "firefall" phenomenon -- when the sun reflects off Horsetail Fall on the eastern edge of El Capitan in Yosemite Valley -- treats visitors to an incredible sight.

title: WATCH:  Mexican army honors rescue dog who died in Turkey
description: The Mexican army bid an emotional farewell to Proteo, a rescue dog who died while searching for survivors of the earthquake that killed more than 41,000 in Turkey and Syria.
